00009 //
00010 // Show auto recovery dialog if there are projects to recover. Should be
00011 // called once at Audacity startup.
00012 //
00013 // This function possibly opens new project windows while it recovers all
00014 // projects. If so, it will re-use *pproj, if != NULL and set it to NULL.
00015 //
00016 // Returns: True, if the start of Audacity should continue as normal
00017 //          False if Audacity should be quit immediately
00018 //
00019 bool ShowAutoRecoveryDialogIfNeeded(AudacityProject** pproj,
00020                                     bool *didRecoverAnything);
